freenet.clients.http.filter
Interface FilterCallback

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericReadFilterCallback, NullFilterCallback
public interface FilterCallback

Callback to be provided to a content filter.

Method Summary

          Process a base URI in the page.

Method Detail

processURI

String processURI(String uri,
                  String overrideType)
                  throws CommentException
Process a URI. If it cannot be turned into something sufficiently safe, then return null.

Parameters:
overrideType - Force the return type.
Throws:
CommentException - If the URI is nvalid or unacceptable in some way.

processURI

String processURI(String uri,
                  String overrideType,
                  boolean noRelative,
                  boolean inline)
                  throws CommentException
Process a URI. If it cannot be turned into something sufficiently safe, then return null.

Parameters:
overrideType - Force the return type.
Throws:
CommentException - If the URI is nvalid or unacceptable in some way.

onBaseHref

String onBaseHref(String baseHref)
Process a base URI in the page. Not only is this filtered, it affects all relative uri's on the page.

onText

void onText(String s,
            String type)
Process plain-text. Notification only; can't modify. Type can be null, or can correspond, for example to HTML tag name around text (for example: "title"). Note that the string will have been fed through the relevant decoder if necessary (e.g. HTMLDecoder). It must be re-encoded if it is sent out as text to a browser.

processForm

String processForm(String method,
                   String action)
                   throws CommentException
Process a form on the page.

Parameters:
method - The form sending method. Normally GET or POST.
action - The URI to send the form to.
Returns:
The new action URI, or null if the form is not allowed.
Throws:
CommentException
